section.title: Definition
section.para: Test-update is the second CentOS Studio module related to repository testing. It allows testing repository updates. As with test-install this testing occurs prior to publishing the final repository. The test-update event follows the test-install event in the repository build process.

For complete information on macros, attributes and elements for the test-install top-level element, see the Deployment Elements Common Model at for a complete description of syntax, macros, attributes and elements.
